QuestData.Title: Vile Defilers
QuestData.Description: The deathweb spiders are remarkable creatures. Their venom twists the very form of their victims.$B$BWe are not the only ones privy to this information. The Shadow Council has already dispatched its warlocks to Deathweb Hollow to infuse the spiders with fel energy so that their venom turns creatures into demonic minions!$B$BWe must destroy the defiling crystals to prevent all of Talador from bending to Teron'gor's will!
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy $1oa Defiling Crystals in Deathweb Hollow.
QuestData.RewardText: <Mehlar smiles.>$B$BIt would seem that the tide of this war is shifting in our favor.
